title: NIAB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Project Associate Posts
description: The National Institute of Animal Biotechnology (NIAB) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the post-graduation can grab this chance and apply for the NIAB Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned more about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2...
